body_html: Thanks! On Fri, Jun 29, 2018 at 11:30 AM Gunhan Gulsoy <notifications@github.com<mailto:notifications@github.com>> wrote: ImportError: libcublas.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory This means TF is looking for cuda 9.0 and failing to find. prebuilt TF packages are built on top of cuda 9.0. To use cuda 9.2, you need to rebuild TF from sources. — You are receiving this because you authored the thread. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<#20149 (comment)>, or mute the thread<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ARPwgXGeoZkDXvUG0CP-yACG2MWQZcHFks5uBcKTgaJpZM4Uvpjr>.
body_text:
Thanks!

On Fri, Jun 29, 2018 at 11:30 AM Gunhan Gulsoy <notifications@github.com<mailto:notifications@github.com>> wrote:

ImportError: libcublas.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory


This means TF is looking for cuda 9.0 and failing to find.
prebuilt TF packages are built on top of cuda 9.0. To use cuda 9.2, you need to rebuild TF from sources.

—
You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<#20149 (comment)>, or mute the thread<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ARPwgXGeoZkDXvUG0CP-yACG2MWQZcHFks5uBcKTgaJpZM4Uvpjr>.
body:
Thanks!

On Fri, Jun 29, 2018 at 11:30 AM Gunhan Gulsoy <notifications@github.com<mailto:notifications@github.com>> wrote:

ImportError: libcublas.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory


This means TF is looking for cuda 9.0 and failing to find.
prebuilt TF packages are built on top of cuda 9.0. To use cuda 9.2, you need to rebuild TF from sources.

—
You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/20149#issuecomment-401255648>, or mute the thread<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ARPwgXGeoZkDXvUG0CP-yACG2MWQZcHFks5uBcKTgaJpZM4Uvpjr>.
